slra.simObjects.utilities

Class Mesh

  • java.lang.Object
    • slra.simObjects.utilities.Mesh

  • public class Mesh
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the mesh of a 3D object in OpenGL
    Author:
    thebennybox, Henry Valentine

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int ibo 
      private int size 
      private int vbo 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Mesh()
      Creates a new Mesh representing a 3D model of an object in OpenGL

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addVertices(Vertex[] vertices, int[] indices)
      Add vertices to this mesh Will not calculate vertex normals
      void addVertices(Vertex[] vertices, int[] indices, boolean calcNormals)
      Add vertices to this mesh
      private void calcNormals(Vertex[] vertices, int[] indices)
      Generates normals for all vertices in the mesh Normals are set as the average normal of all the faces that a vertex belongs to.
      void draw()
      Renders this mesh through the shader program

    • Method Detail

      • addVertices

        public void addVertices(Vertex[] vertices,
                        int[] indices,
                        boolean calcNormals)
        Add vertices to this mesh
        Parameters:
        vertices - : Vertices of the Mesh
        indices - : the order in which these vertices are drawn (Allows vertex reuse)
        calcNormals - : boolean value. Do normals need to be calculated?

      • addVertices

        public void addVertices(Vertex[] vertices,
                        int[] indices)
        Add vertices to this mesh Will not calculate vertex normals
        Parameters:
        vertices - : Vertices of the Mesh
        indices - : the order in which these vertices are drawn (Allows vertex reuse)

      • draw

        public void draw()
        Renders this mesh through the shader program

      • calcNormals

        private void calcNormals(Vertex[] vertices,
                         int[] indices)
        Generates normals for all vertices in the mesh Normals are set as the average normal of all the faces that a vertex belongs to.
